## How to Contribute

1. Create your donor profile in `profiles/donors/`
2. Record contributions in `contributions/donors/<your-slug>/<year>/`
3. Include the required `amount: $<USD>` line
4. Submit a pull request

See [CLAUDE.md](../CLAUDE.md) for detailed instructions.
